content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、我が理念に賛同の意を示しながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-you show agreement with my ideals, yet...\""},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なおも我に牙を剥くというか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You still bare your fangs at me!?"},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、なんで脱いだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, why did you take them off?\""},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ……はははは……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe... hahahaha...!\""},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿にするなよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't mock me!\""},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様のその驕った蒙昧！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your arrogant ignorance!\""},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我が正す！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will correct it!\""},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我の理念は真理！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My ideals are the truth!\""},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我が戦いは救世の礎！」","translatedEnglishLine":"My fight is the foundation of salvation!\""},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪の異教徒に我が鉄槌！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To the evil heretics, my iron hammer!\""},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"　振り下ろしてくれる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I shall bring it down!\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むぅぅぅぅぅぅぅぅん！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Muuuuuuuun!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"裸族王バファムーンから、","translatedEnglishLine":"From the Naked Tribe King Bafamoon,"},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"尋常ではない力の放出が行われる。","translatedEnglishLine":"an extraordinary release of power erupts."},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"その暴力的なまでの気迫に、","translatedEnglishLine":"By that violently intense spirit,"},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは自然と一歩退いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"you naturally stepped back a step."},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我を倒したくば！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you wish to defeat me!\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その命、捨てる気でかかってまいれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come at me willing to give up your life!\""},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー、倒した倒した」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nah, I defeated you, I defeated you.\""},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あう……恥ずかしかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Auw... that was embarrassing...\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「強敵だったわ……色々な意味で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You were a tough opponent... in many ways...\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのとき――","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment—"},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"洞窟内を包む光がゆっくりと消えていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the light filling the cave slowly faded away."},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、服……戻ったわね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, the clothes... they're back.\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっ……良かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... thank goodness.\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、服！　文明の利器！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, clothes! The tools of civilization!"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱり安心するー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"They really bring a sense of relief!\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm?\""},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、なんであんたはまだ裸なの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, why are you still naked!?\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうせ変わらないから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since it wouldn't change anything,"},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　洞窟の中で服脱いどいた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I took my clothes off inside the cave.\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しめつけ、きらい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I hate being constricted."},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はだか、すき」","translatedEnglishLine":"I like being naked.\""},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「幼児みたいだねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’re like a little kid...\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああもう、あたしの白衣着ときなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, geez, just wear my lab coat.\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh...\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"周りが騒いでいる中、","translatedEnglishLine":"While the others were making a fuss,"},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"パセリがバファムーンに近づいていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Paseri approached Bafamoon."},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バファムーンさんの言っていたランプはこれね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is the lamp Bafamoon was talking about.\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜パァーーーーン！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<PA-AAAN!>"},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kya!\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひ、独りでに砕けちゃった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-it shattered all by itself...\""},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とりあえず、悪魔に苦しめられる人が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, those suffering under demons"},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"　未然に防げて良かった……と言ったところかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"can be prevented from suffering... I guess.\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これで一件落着、ね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, case closed now...\""},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの、＜エール＞ちゃん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, Aile-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたにスシヌが声をかけてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sushinu spoke to you."},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"その表情は何故か赤く染まっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, her face was flushed red."},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その……なんていうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... how should I say this...\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっきはありがとう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you for earlier...\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……＜エール＞ちゃんのおかげで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... thanks to you, Aile-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わたし、頑張れたよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was able to do my best...\""},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うぅん！　そんなことないよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no! That's not true!\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"スシヌにしては珍しく","translatedEnglishLine":"Uncharacteristically for Sushinu,"},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの言葉を否定した。","translatedEnglishLine":"she denied your words."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、我が理念に賛同の意を示しながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-you show agreement with my ideals, yet..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なおも我に牙を剥くというか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You still bare your fangs at me!?
"Wait, why did you take them off?"
My fight is the foundation of salvation!"
"To the evil heretics, my iron hammer!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸族王バファムーンから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the Naked Tribe King Bafamoon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 尋常ではない力の放出が行われる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an extraordinary release of power erupts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その暴力的なまでの気迫に、
あなたは自然と一歩退いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you naturally stepped back a step.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その命、捨てる気でかかってまいれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come at me willing to give up your life!"
"Nah, I defeated you, I defeated you."
"You were a tough opponent... in many ways..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟内を包む光がゆっくりと消えていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the light filling the cave slowly faded away.
They really bring a sense of relief!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、なんであんたはまだ裸なの！？」
洞窟の中で服脱いどいた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I took my clothes off inside the cave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああもう、あたしの白衣着ときなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, geez, just wear my lab coat."
While the others were making a fuss,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パセリがバファムーンに近づいていた。
「バファムーンさんの言っていたランプはこれね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the lamp Bafamoon was talking about."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とりあえず、悪魔に苦しめられる人が
未然に防げて良かった……と言ったところかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can be prevented from suffering... I guess."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたにスシヌが声をかけてきた。
その表情は何故か赤く染まっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, her face was flushed red.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……＜エール＞ちゃんのおかげで……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to do my best..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うぅん！　そんなことないよ！」
スシヌにしては珍しく
あなたの言葉を否定した。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、我が理念に賛同の意を示しながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-you show agreement with my ideals, yet..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なおも我に牙を剥くというか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You still bare your fangs at me!?
"Wait, why did you take them off?"
My fight is the foundation of salvation!"
"To the evil heretics, my iron hammer!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸族王バファムーンから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the Naked Tribe King Bafamoon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 尋常ではない力の放出が行われる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an extraordinary release of power erupts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その暴力的なまでの気迫に、
あなたは自然と一歩退いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you naturally stepped back a step.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その命、捨てる気でかかってまいれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come at me willing to give up your life!"
"Nah, I defeated you, I defeated you."
"You were a tough opponent... in many ways..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟内を包む光がゆっくりと消えていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the light filling the cave slowly faded away.
They really bring a sense of relief!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、なんであんたはまだ裸なの！？」
洞窟の中で服脱いどいた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I took my clothes off inside the cave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああもう、あたしの白衣着ときなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, geez, just wear my lab coat."
While the others were making a fuss,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パセリがバファムーンに近づいていた。
「バファムーンさんの言っていたランプはこれね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the lamp Bafamoon was talking about."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とりあえず、悪魔に苦しめられる人が
未然に防げて良かった……と言ったところかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can be prevented from suffering... I guess."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたにスシヌが声をかけてきた。
その表情は何故か赤く染まっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, her face was flushed red.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……＜エール＞ちゃんのおかげで……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to do my best..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うぅん！　そんなことないよ！」
スシヌにしては珍しく
あなたの言葉を否定した。
